title: On $m$-point homogeneous polyhedra in $3$-dimensional Euclidean space
abstract:
This paper is devoted to the study of the $m$-point homogeneity property for
the vertex sets of polytopes in Euclidean spaces. In particular, we present the
classifications of $2$-point and $3$-point homogeneous polyhedra in
$\mathbb{R}^3$.
